scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Photographs series (dated 1981, undated; 0.5 cubic feet; 40 items) comprises photographs detailing UMWA charters and leaders (including JD Wood, Tom Raney, Carson Hibbitts, Ed. J. Morgan, James W. Riding, Joseph Smith, and Dennis Walker), coal miners, company towns (including Coalton), rail stops, mine disaster/ explosion aftermath scenes (including the Explosion at Belva #1 Four Mile Bell County), miner and mine equipment (including miner's hats with headlamps, cutting machines, and various belongings) and various scenes of coal camp life such as English language classes and funerals.
